name: Amusing Catventures
description:
Controls: use mouse (duh, you're a cat...)

Made for Ludum Dare 33. Submission page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=28738

Money from this game goes straight to Davis. And since he's a super-serious cat and he doesn't care about toys, he'll spend all of this money on food.
